title: Pure Magic || Praggnanandhaa vs Sindarov || Chess Olympiad (2022)
description:
Watch entire Bobby Fischer saga here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0A8-8M8fb04&list=PLDnx7w_xuguENa5LgFG7Gi8aYRVVnXxFE

Have a great day :)

Praggnanandhaa R (2648) - Sindarov, Javokhir (2629)
Chennai Chess Olympiad | Open (chess24.com) [10] 2022.08.08
D38 Queen's Gambit Declined, Ragozin variation

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 g6 3.Nc3 Bg7 4.e4 d6 5.Nf3 O-O 6.Be2 e5 7.O-O h6 8.Re1 Nbd7 9.Qc2 Re8 10.dxe5 dxe5 11.Be3 c6 12.Na4 Qc7 13.c5 b5 14.cxb6 e.p. axb6 15.h3 Qb8 16.Red1 b5 17.Nc5 Nxc5 18.Bxc5 Be6 19.Bd6 Qb6 20.Bxe5 Rxa2 21.Rxa2 Bxa2 22.Bxf6 Bxf6 23.b3 Qa5 24.Qxc6 Re6 25.Qc8+ Kg7 26.Qc2 Qa3 27.e5 Bxe5 28.Nxe5 Rxe5 29.Qc3 Qc5 30.Qb2 Bxb3 31.Re1 Be6 32.Bg4 Kf6 33.Kh2 g5 34.g3 Bxg4 35.f4 Bf5 36.Rxe5 Qc2+ 37.Qxc2 Bxc2 38.Rxb5 Kg6 39.Rb4 f6 40.Kg2 Bd3 41.Kf2 Ba6 42.g4 gxf4 43.Rxf4 h5 44.gxh5+ Kxh5 45.Rxf6 Bd3 46.Kg3 Bg6 47.Ra6 Bd3 48.Ra5+ Kh6 49.Kh4 Kg6 50.Rg5+ Kh6 51.Rd5 Bc2 52.Rd6+ Kg7 53.Kg5 Bb1 54.Rd7+ Kg8 55.Rc7 Bd3 56.Kh6 Bf5 57.Rg7+ Kf8 58.Rg3 Bc2 59.Rg2 Be4 60.Rg1 Kf7 61.Rg4 Bd3 62.Rg3 Bc2 63.Rg2 Bd3 64.Rg7+ Kf8 65.Rg3 Bc2 66.h4 Kf7 67.Rc3 Bb1 68.Rf3+ Kg8 69.Rg3+ Kf7 70.Rg7+ Kf8 71.Rg5 Kf7 72.Kh5 Kf6 73.Kg4 Bc2 74.h5 Bd1+ 75.Kf4 Bc2 76.h6 Bg6 77.Rg1

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:39 Game Starts!
02:00 Completely New Game!
03:41 Pauase the video!
13:00 It Was In This Position
14:40 Contributions

The 44th FIDE Chess Olympiad is taking place in Chennai, India from July 29 to August 9, 2022, with almost 200 national teams in the Open section and over 150 in the Women's. Each team consists of 5 players, with 4 playing each match, and they battle it out in a Swiss system over 11 rounds.

Players receive 90 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 30 minutes to the end of the game, plus a 30-second increment starting from move one. No draw offers are allowed before move 30. Teams score 2 match points for a win and 1 for a draw. Official website: chessolympiad.fide.com
